com.jacobschneider.engine.math.vectorcalc

Interface VectorField

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractVectorField, CartesianVectorField, SumVectorField

    public interface VectorField
    A vector field over 3 dimensional real space
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      VectorField add(VectorField otherField)
      Adds this vector field to another one
      Vector3 curl(Vector3 point)
      Evaluates the curl of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space
      double divergence(Vector3 point)
      Evaluates the divergence of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space
      Vector3 getValue(Vector3 point)
      The value of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space.
